title: Stadium construction/renovation costs UEFA EURO 2016
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Stadiums, and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in each Stadiums on the y axis.

The maximum Construction/renovation costs in million euros 381.0 is found at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and the minimum is found at Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) where Stadiums is 60.0.
The Construction/renovation costs in million euros of Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) is 6.35% larger than the minimum value at Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Stadiums in the x axis and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in the y axis.
The Construction/renovation costs in million euros is highest at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and lowest at Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Stadiums, and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in each Stadiums on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Construction/renovation costs in million euros for 9 number of Stadiumss.

Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) has the highest Construction/renovation costs in million euros and Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) has the lowest Construction/renovation costs in million euros.
The Construction/renovation costs in million euros of Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) is 6.35% larger than the minimum value at Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).

The Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) has the highest Construction/renovation costs in million euros, followed by Grand Stade LMCU Lille (new stadium), and Stade Vélodrome Marseille (major renovation). Down to the Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) which is the lowest.
Stadiums Stade Bollaert Lens (major renovation), and Stade Geoffroy Guichard Saint-Etienne (major renovation) have a similar Construction/renovation costs in million euros that is 75.0.
The lowest value 60.0 at Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) is almost 2.05 times smaller than the average value 185.56.
